functional/all.html.name: Functional Tests Suite
functional/all.html.description: Qunit Composite file with all functional tests ran on single page.

functional/taskbarInteractions.html.name: Interactions
functional/taskbarInteractions.html.description: Tests mostly covering taskbar interactions: draggable, resizable and sortable.

functional/windowConfirmClose.html.name: Confirm close
functional/windowConfirmClose.html.description: Tests covering window confirm close functionality.

functional/windowFlow.html.name: Flow
functional/windowFlow.html.description: Tests covering window flow: minimizing, maximizing, showing and restoring, and how those interact with draggable and resizable.

functional/windowInteractions.html.name: Interactions
functional/windowInteractions.html.description: Tests covering mostly window interactions: draggable and resizable, and also how window react to various "containment" settings.

manual/taskbarNetworkMonitor.html.name: Network monitor
manual/taskbarNetworkMonitor.html.description: Test checking if network monitor button gets into the right state, based on network status.

manual/taskbarToggleFullscreen.html.name: Toggle fullscreen
manual/taskbarToggleFullscreen.html.description: Test checking if toggle fullscreen button gets into the right state, based on the current browser fullscreen state.

stress/taskbarWindowButtonsVisibility.ht.name: Window buttons visibility
stress/taskbarWindowButtonsVisibility.ht.description: Test that make sure window buttons are always visible, with different font sizes and varying number of buttons.

templates/template.manual.html.name: Manual test template
templates/template.manual.html.description: Template for those test that cannot be automated.

templates/template.unit.html.name: Unit test template
templates/template.unit.html.description: Template for all automated tests: unit, functional, and stress.

unit/all.html.name: Unit Tests Suite
unit/all.html.description: Qunit Composite file with all unit tests ran on single page.

unit/debug.html.name: Debug
unit/debug.html.description: Shared window and taskbar tests covering the debug functionality.

unit/languagesLocalization.html.name: Languages and localization
unit/languagesLocalization.html.description: Shared window and taskbar tests covering languages and localization options, methods and events.

unit/taskbarButtonsIcons.html.name: Buttons and icons
unit/taskbarButtonsIcons.html.description: Taskbar tests regarding various taskbar buttons and icons used on those buttons.

unit/taskbarPositionDimensions.html.name: Position and dimensions
unit/taskbarPositionDimensions.html.description: Taskbar tests covering options regarding taskbar size and position on screen.

unit/windowDialog.html.name: jQuery UI Dialog tests
unit/windowDialog.html.description: jQuery UI Dialog tests that are relevant to window widget.
